name: sturdy

effect.black-white: Does not prevent regular KOs from full HP.
effect.black-2-white-2: Does not prevent regular KOs from full HP.

short_effect: Prevents being KOed from full HP, leaving 1 HP instead. Protects against the one-hit KO moves regardless of HP.

flavor_text.black-white: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.
